message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its value. I could consider coming down to $11,000. This offer reflects the true worth of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,750. Can you consider this price?
